bugs.summary: Use ffvpx to do hw decoding for VP9 and AV1 on Windows
Make images return correct color depth when playing videos with bit depth higher than 8
Make `HTMLEditor` clean up unnecessary padding line break which is immediately after inserting content
Space character disappears from contenteditable, when typing after doing Ctrl+Backspace (or option+Backspace) to delete a word
provide a way to get the caret frame without computing the caret rects
Try optimizing away the APZ hit test for some mousemove events
Allow searching for tab group names in the address bar and display matching tab groups as actions
[IAB Banners] Build leaderboard (smaller banner) and billboard (larger banner)
mach fails with Python 3.12.8, Python 3.13.1 (regression with new Python releases)
Fonts should use in content sizes in profiles ui
